deprecationWarnings: 299 Elasticsearch-6.8.0-65b6179 "the default number of shards will change from [5] to [1] in 7.0.0; if you wish to continue using the default of [5] shards, you must manage this on the create index request or with an index template"
299 Elasticsearch-6.8.0-65b6179 "[_all] is deprecated in 6.0+ and will be removed in 7.0. As a replacement, you can use [copy_to] on mapping fields to create your own catch all field."

299 Elasticsearch-6.8.0-65b6179 "[types removal] The parameter include_type_name should be explicitly specified in create index requests to prepare for 7.0. In 7.0 include_type_name will default to 'false', and requests are expected to omit the type name in mapping definitions."
